structure.unit: Consumer Choice Of Physician Assistant Services

law.catch_line: Participating Provider Physician Assistants To Be Included On Publicly Accessible List Of Participating Providers
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 224, Sec. 216 effective November 4, 2012.] Notwithstanding any general or special law to the contrary, a carrier shall ensure that all participating provider physician assistants are included on any publicly accessible list of participating providers for the carrier.
